content: piece of my heart is worked in the normal overlay mosaic row by row technique this free pattern of a little heart can be used in any project you fancy you could crochet just one square for a coaster add these to your current project or make a whole blanket or cushion cover as this is a completely free pattern i haven t given any yarn stats but you can use any yarn and corresponding hook you like the pdf has 1 easy-to-read chart and corresponding written instructions two pdfs are available - one using us and one using uk terms please do share your creations online and tag #getyerhookon and #mosaicheart happy crocheting abi
